allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: project documentation

- PRD v2: product requirements and vision
- Claude Code kickoff: development instructions and structure
- .gitignore: basic ignore patterns

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Upload compressed photos instead of originals

Reduces storage usage by compressing images to 1200px max 
and 85% JPEG quality before uploading to Supabase Storage.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Search and Settings pages with full functionality

- Search page with text search and color filters
- Settings page with zone management \(add/edit/delete\)
- Added refetch function to useZones hook
- Added Dialog component for zone editing modals

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
